title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: CE69003 Hydraulic and Water Resources Engineering Laboratory (0-0-3) 2 CreditsMeasurement of velocity profile in straight open channel (with and without obstruction); experiments on boundary layer; discharge measurement by weir and end-depth methods; measurement of shear stress; measurement of rainfall, evaporation, infiltration - laboratory and field tests; measurement of sediment load; water balance studies
